title: Kid Friendly Mini Taco Bites Appetizer Recipe
directions: Brown 1 pound of ground beef, and add in the taco seasoning to taste.
Lay out a plate full of Scoops tortilla chips with the bowl side up on a large plate or platter.
Add a small scoop of ground beef to each Scoop and top with a pinch of cheese. Pop the whole tray of mini taco bites into the microwave and microwave for about 30 to 45 seconds.
Top with salsa and sour cream, or your favorite taco toppings.
You can add a slice of jalapeno if your kids like it hot, or if you have some adults in the crowd.
